entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Claresholm
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.4°C

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:26 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 10 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to minus 10 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:26 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:26 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
